name: Star Child (itch) (Yiyi HE)
description:
Star Child created by the team Blue Tomato is a 2.5D Top-down Exploration RPG with an emphasis on art direction and a cryptic narrative. Set within Starland, play as the Star Child who recently sprouted from the ‘Star Tree’, as they explore the abandoned ‘Starland’ left behind by the former inhabitants and try to bring back prosperity to the island. Take control of the Star Child and uncover the mystery behind the island of Star Land.

Blue Tomato was a GDS6 team created for our capstone project. The team is art-oriented and each member has their unique talents. During the development, there were a total of 5 members who worked on this project Lan, the Art lead; Nova, the Illustrator; Henry, the writer; and I, the producer. Sadie was a huge help in the early stages of development but unfortunately left during mid development.

Overall this was a fun project to work on, it granted me insight into Unity's 2D game-making.
